Meeting Title: Calico Resources USA Technical Review Team (TRT) Meeting
Meeting Location: DOGAMI Mineral Land Regulation & Reclamation Office, 229 Broadalbin Street SW
Details:
The Technical Review Team (TRT) for the Calico Resources proposed gold mine in Malheur County is scheduled to meet by phone and in person on February 14, 2020 from 9:30 am – 11:00 am (PST). The TRT is an inter-disciplinary team of state agencies that reviews information related to a proposed mine during all phases of the application process, and ultimately develops consolidated permit conditions that conform to Oregon regulations.

The public may listen to the meeting in person at the Oregon Department of Geology and Mineral Industries (DOGAMI) Mineral Land Regulation & Reclamation Office at 229 Broadalbin Street SW, Albany, Oregon 97321 or by phone. To listen by phone dial 1 (866) 434-5269 and enter the access code (8863532#).

Meeting materials may also be presented online at: www.webmeeting.att.com (Meeting number 1-866-434-5269; Access code 8863532). For assistance, please contact the DOGAMI Albany office at (541) 967-2083.

REASONABLE ACCOMMODATION OF DISABILITIES
Reasonable accommodation, such as assisted hearing devices, sign language interpreters, and materials in large print or audiotape, will be provided as requested. In order to ensure availability, please contact the DOGAMI Albany Office at (541) 967-2083 at least 72 hours prior to the meeting to make your request. Services for persons with a hearing or speech disability are available by dialing 711.

PUBLIC MEETING
Technical Review Team (TRT) and subcommittee meetings are public meetings under Oregon’s Public Meeting Law. The meeting will be tape recorded and a summary of the meeting will be prepared. The public is able to listen to the TRT discussion in person or by phone.

Reasonable accommodation, such as assisted hearing devices, sign language interpreters, and materials in large print or audiotape, will be provided as requested.  In order to ensure availability, please contact the DOGAMI Albany Office at (541) 967-2040 at least 72 hours prior to the meeting to make your request.
